body.p: If the fair value of biological assets previously measured at their cost less any accumulated depreciation and any accumulated impairment losses becomes reliably measurable during the current period, an entity shall disclose for those biological assets:

li.p: a description of the biological assets;
an explanation of why fair value has become reliably measurable; and
